SELECT PO.COM_ID, PO.PO_ID, PO.PO_GRADE, PO.HOPE_DEPARTMENT, PO.PO_START_DATE, PO.PO_END_DATE, PO.PO_PROFILE, PO.PO_TITLE, PO.PO_CONTENT, PO.CAREER
FROM POSTING PO INNER JOIN COMPANY COM ON PO.COM_ID = COM.COM_ID
WHERE PO.COM_ID = 1
ORDER BY PO.PO_ID ASC

SELECT AP.AP_ID, US.USER_NAME, RE.RE_TITLE, PO.PO_TITLE, PO.PO_END_DATE, AP.RESULT
FROM COMPANY COM JOIN POSTING PO ON COM.COM_ID = PO.COM_ID JOIN APPLY AP ON PO.PO_ID = AP.PO_ID JOIN RESUME RE ON AP.RE_ID = RE.RE_ID JOIN USERS US ON RE.USER_ID = US.USER_ID
WHERE PO.COM_ID = #{ com_id }
ORDER BY AP.AP_ID ASC

SELECT AP.AP_ID, AP.RE_ID, US.USER_NAME, RE.RE_TITLE, PO.PO_TITLE, PO.PO_END_DATE, AP.RESULT
FROM COMPANY COM JOIN POSTING PO ON COM.COM_ID = PO.COM_ID JOIN APPLY AP ON PO.PO_ID = AP.PO_ID JOIN RESUME RE ON AP.RE_ID = RE.RE_ID JOIN USERS US ON RE.USER_ID = US.USER_ID
WHERE PO.COM_ID = #{ com_id } AND AP.AP_ID = #{ ap_id }
ORDER BY AP.AP_ID ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME ( USER_ID, RE_ID, RE_PROFILE, RE_TITLE, RE_INTTI, RE_INTCON, LICENSE ) VALUES ( #{ user_id }, (SELECT NVL(MAX(RE_ID), 0) + 1 FROM RESUME), #{ re_profile }, #{ re_title }, #{ re_intti }, #{ re_intcon }, #{ license } )
INSERT INTO APPLY ( PO_ID, RE_ID, AP_ID ) VALUES ( 1101, #{ re_id }, (SELECT NVL(MAX(AP_ID), 0) + 1 FROM APPLY) )
mapper.update: UPDATE RESUME SET USER_ID = #{ user_id }, RE_ID = #{ re_id }, RE_PROFILE = #{ re_profile }, RE_TITLE = #{ re_title }, RE_INTTI = #{ re_intti }, RE_INTCON = #{ re_intcon }, LICENSE = #{ license } WHERE USER_ID = #{ user_id } AND RE_ID = #{ re_id }
